subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Milwaukee bounced back from a tough defeat, scoring nine runs in the first three innings yesterday and making it easy for Ben Sheets to win his sixth decision in a row as the visiting Brewers routed the Chicago Cubs, 13-4.
snippet: Milwaukee bounced back from a tough defeat, scoring nine runs in the first three innings yesterday and making it easy for Ben Sheets to win his sixth decision in a row as the visiting Brewers routed the Chicago Cubs, 13-4.
